facts.fact: Zapier integrates with over 3,000 apps, allowing users to automate workflows without coding.
Zapier is used by over 4 million users worldwide to streamline their business processes.
Zapier offers a free plan that allows users to create simple automations with limited features.
Zapier's automation tools can save businesses an average of 10 hours per week.

risks: Potential market saturation with similar automation tools.
Changing regulations in the EU and UK regarding data privacy and automation.
Dependence on third-party app integrations which may change or be discontinued.
